summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mini-Pactum CRM application. Backend APIs working at 96.4% success rate. Frontend login, dashboard, navigation, and core functionality working correctly for both admin and client users. Spanish interface properly implemented with corporate dark theme.

minor_bugs.issue: Client access denial test returned no response instead of 403
minor_bugs.impact: Test validation issue, not functional bug

navigation_issues.issue: Timeout finding 'Tareas' link in sidebar dropdown

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fixes needed: 1) Fix React warning for Progress component indicatorClassName prop, 2) Investigate Tasks navigation timeout issue in sidebar dropdown, 3) Verify client access denial returns proper 403 status code
